title: Alorica Adds 150 Positions in Texarkana, TX
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 5:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Alorica 
TEXARKANA, TX -- (Marketwired) -- 10/12/15 -- Alorica , a worldwide leading provider of customer management outsourcing solutions, today announced its plans to hire 175 customer care associates at its facility in Texarkana, AR, located at 3432 Jefferson Blvd., Texarkana, AR 71854. 
Representatives from Alorica will host a job fair on site on October 13 and 14 to recruit for seasonal and full-time positions. Employees will begin training on October 26 and report to the operation manager as of November 2. In the customer care role, employees will be responsible for handling requests from customers, processing credit card authorizations, and providing guidance and support on a case-by-case basis. 
"Alorica aims to provide the best possible service and care to our customers, and that requires ramping up resources during the busiest season of the year," said Vincent Patterson, Assistant Site Director, Alorica. "We look forward to tapping into Texarkana's talent pool and boosting the region's economy." 
The job fair will take place from 10:00a.m. to 4:00p.m. on October 13 and 14. Candidates will be offered interviews on the spot and have a chance to discuss benefits and training opportunities with executive leadership on site. 
For more information about career opportunities at Alorica, please visit: www.aloricajobs.com . 
About Alorica Alorica is a worldwide leading provider of customer management outsourcing solutions spanning the entire customer lifecycle. From customer acquisition and sales, to customer care and support, to logistics and fulfillment, Alorica offers a seamless customer experience across all service channels. Alorica's award-winning Business Process Outsourcing services span both the Business-to-Consumer (B2C) and Business-to-Business (B2B) sectors across all industries for Fortune 1000 companies. Headquartered in Irvine, Calif. with more than 48,000 employees in 73 locations, Alorica offers the proven industry experience and know-how to provide a total customer management solution.
